text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline] be a subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^9[/mathjaxinline]. Suppose [mathjaxinline]\mathcal{B} = \{ v_1; v_2; \ldots v_5\}[/mathjaxinline] is a basis of [mathjaxinline]W[/mathjaxinline]. Let [mathjaxinline]w \in W[/mathjaxinline]. Then [mathjaxinline][w]_{\mathcal{B}}[/mathjaxinline] is an element of what space?

font.p: [mathjaxinline][w]_{\mathcal{B}}[/mathjaxinline] is defined to be a column of five scalars; specifically, the five scalars [mathjaxinline]a_1, a_2, \ldots a_5[/mathjaxinline] such that [mathjaxinline]w = a_1 v_1 + \ldots a_5v_5[/mathjaxinline].
